name: Rocket Maze
description:
The game is simillar to Project Boost from GameDev Tv's Unity Course. 

To Play:

'Space' : To thrust.

'A' and 'D': To rotate left and right.

'Esc': To exit the game. (Don't use it or you'll have to reload the page to play the game)

Try to complete all the levels and enjoy playing them over and over and over ...

I wasn't able to get my idea working, so instead I am posting this one, hope the levels are enjoyable.
